com.facebook.react.uimanager

Class BaseViewManagerDelegate<T extends android.view.View,U extends BaseViewManagerInterface<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.react.uimanager.BaseViewManagerDelegate<T,U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewManagerDelegate<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityIndicatorViewManagerDelegate, AndroidDialogPickerManagerDelegate, AndroidDrawerLayoutManagerDelegate, AndroidDropdownPickerManagerDelegate, AndroidProgressBarManagerDelegate, AndroidSwipeRefreshLayoutManagerDelegate, AndroidSwitchManagerDelegate, AndroidViewPagerManagerDelegate, InputAccessoryViewManagerDelegate, MaskedViewManagerDelegate, ModalHostViewManagerDelegate, ProgressViewManagerDelegate, PullToRefreshViewManagerDelegate, SafeAreaViewManagerDelegate, SegmentedControlManagerDelegate, SliderManagerDelegate, SwitchManagerDelegate, UnimplementedNativeViewManagerDelegate

    public abstract class BaseViewManagerDelegate<T extends android.view.View,U extends BaseViewManagerInterface<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewManagerDelegate<T>
    This is a base implementation of ViewManagerDelegate which supports setting properties that every view should support, such as rotation, background color, etc.
